intents.name: Welcome
responses: Hello! Welcome to ParkShare! üöó I'm your parking assistant. I can help you find parking spaces, manage bookings, or assist with hosting. What would you like to do today?
Hi there! I'm the ParkShare assistant. Whether you're looking to park or list a space, I'm here to help. What can I do for you?
Welcome to ParkShare! I can help you with finding parking, managing your bookings, or setting up spaces as a host. How can I assist you?

intents.name: Default Fallback
responses: I'm not sure I understand. Could you rephrase that? I can help with finding parking, bookings, payments, or hosting spaces.
I didn't quite get that. Would you like to search for parking, check your bookings, or get help with something else?
Sorry, I'm having trouble understanding. Try asking me about parking spaces, bookings, payments, or how to become a host.

intents.name: FindParking
trainingPhrases: I need to park my car
responses: I'd be happy to help you find parking! Where are you looking to park? You can tell me an address, landmark, or area.
Great! Let me help you find the perfect parking spot. What location are you interested in?
I can help you search for available parking spaces. Where would you like to park?

intents.name: FindParking-Location

parameters.name: location
prompts: Where exactly would you like to park?

responses: Looking for parking spaces in $location. What dates do you need the parking for? Please provide start date and time.
Perfect! I'm searching for available parking in $location. When do you need the space? (e.g., 'tomorrow at 9 AM' or 'Dec 25 from 2 PM')
Got it! Searching parking near $location. What's your preferred time? When do you need to park?

intents.name: FindParking-DateTime

parameters.name: start-time
prompts: When do you need to start parking?

responses: Excellent! I found several parking spaces in $location starting $start-time. Would you like to see options sorted by price, rating, or distance?
Great! Here are available parking spaces for $start-time in $location. I can show you spaces by: 1) Lowest price 2) Highest rating 3) Nearest distance. Which do you prefer?
Perfect! I have parking options in $location for your requested time. How would you like me to sort them - by price, rating, or proximity?

intents.name: FilterParking-Price
responses:

3. **$space3-title** - KSH $space3-price/hour ‚≠ê $space3-rating

Would you like more details about any of these?
I've sorted the results by price. The cheapest options are showing first. Would you like to see details about a specific parking space?
Showing budget-friendly parking spaces. Type a number (1-3) to see full details and book.

responses:

intents.name: BecomeHost
trainingPhrases: I want to be a host
I have a parking spot to rent
responses:
That's great! You can earn money by renting out your parking space. üí∞

To get started:
1. Sign up as a Host (if you haven't already)
2. Add your parking space details
3. Set your pricing
4. Start accepting bookings!

Would you like me to guide you through adding your first parking space?

Excellent! Becoming a ParkShare host is easy and profitable. Here's how:

‚úÖ Create a host profile
‚úÖ List your parking space(s)
‚úÖ Set your own prices
‚úÖ Accept or decline bookings
‚úÖ Get paid directly

Shall we start by adding your parking space?

Welcome to ParkShare hosting! üéâ

As a host, you can:
- Earn passive income
- Control your availability
- Set your own rates
- Get insurance coverage

Ready to add your first parking space?

intents.name: FAQ-HowItWorks
responses:
ParkShare connects drivers looking for parking with hosts who have spaces to rent! üöó

**For Drivers:**
1. Search for parking in your desired location
2. Book and pay securely via M-Pesa
3. Park with confidence!

**For Hosts:**
1. List your parking space
2. Set your own prices
3. Earn passive income!

What would you like to do?

Welcome to ParkShare - The easiest way to find or rent parking! üÖøÔ∏è

Drivers can find and book parking spaces instantly.
Hosts can earn money from unused parking spaces.

All payments are secure, and we provide insurance coverage for hosts.

Want to find parking or become a host?

ParkShare is a peer-to-peer parking marketplace:

‚úÖ Find parking anywhere
‚úÖ Book instantly with M-Pesa
‚úÖ Earn money from your driveway
‚úÖ Safe and secure transactions

How can I help you get started?

intents.name: FAQ-Pricing
responses:
ParkShare Pricing:

**For Drivers:**
- No signup fees
- Pay only for parking you book
- Prices set by individual hosts
- Small service fee (10%) added to bookings

**For Hosts:**
- Free to list your space
- 15% commission on bookings
- You keep 85% of earnings
- No hidden fees

Start parking or hosting today!

Our pricing is transparent and fair:

**Drivers:** Pay the host's rate + 10% service fee
**Hosts:** Keep 85% of all earnings

No subscription fees, no hidden charges!

Prices vary by location and host. Search to see rates in your area.

Transparent Pricing:

üöó Drivers: Host's rate + small service fee
üè† Hosts: Earn 85% of booking price

No membership fees for anyone!

Want to see prices in your area?

intents.name: FAQ-Safety
responses:
Your safety is our top priority! üîí

‚úÖ All hosts are verified
‚úÖ Secure M-Pesa payments
‚úÖ Insurance coverage available
‚úÖ 24/7 customer support
‚úÖ Driver and host ratings/reviews
‚úÖ Secure messaging system

Every parking space is rated by real users. Always check reviews before booking!

ParkShare takes security seriously:

- Identity verification for all users
- Encrypted payment processing
- Insurance protection
- User review system
- Reported incidents handled promptly
- Support team available 24/7

Your peace of mind matters to us!

Safety Features:

üîê Verified users only
üí≥ Secure payments (M-Pesa)
üõ°Ô∏è Insurance available
‚≠ê Review system
üëÆ Incident reporting
üìû 24/7 support

Book with confidence!

intents.name: FAQ-Cancellation
responses:
ParkShare Cancellation Policy:

‚úÖ **Free cancellation** up to 24 hours before booking
‚úÖ 50% refund if cancelled 12-24 hours before
‚ùå No refund if cancelled less than 12 hours before

Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days to your M-Pesa.

To cancel, go to 'My Bookings' or tell me the booking ID.

Our cancellation policy is flexible:

- More than 24h before: Full refund
- 12-24h before: 50% refund
- Less than 12h: No refund

Exceptions for emergencies - contact support.

Want to cancel a booking?

Cancellation & Refunds:

üïê Cancel early (24h+) ‚Üí Full refund
üïê Cancel 12-24h before ‚Üí Half refund
üïê Cancel last minute ‚Üí No refund

Refunds take 3-5 business days.

Need to cancel a booking now?

intents.name: Goodbye
responses: You're welcome! Happy parking with ParkShare! üöó Feel free to ask me anything anytime.
Glad I could help! Safe travels and happy parking! üÖøÔ∏è
Thank you for using ParkShare! Drive safe! üöô
Goodbye! Don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything. Have a great day! üëã
